english.segment1: Years have passed before me. Changing my view to things I see. See my inner world on collide. With another that I left outside. I lived for hate so many years. I tried to hide from pain and tears. Tears I wept all for vain. In world of grief I was until. Until I tasted blood of His vine. Until Until..
english.segment2: I lived for greed conscience seared. But all I possessed was only fear. Fear grew in a shapes of gray. In world of grief I was until
english.segment3: Until I tasted blood of His vine. Until Until..
english.segment4: Until I tasted blood of His vine. Until Until..
